action.name: Run in Terminal (root)
Запустить в Терминале (root)
action.description: Run selected file in Terminal with root previlegies

action.name: Open Thunar here (root)
Открыть Thunar здесь (root)
action.description: Open this folder with administrative rights

action.name: Create symlink
Создать символическую ссылку
action.command: bash -c 'F="$1"; N="$2"; P=$(readlink -f "$PWD"); R=$(readlink -f "$F"); [ "$P" = "$R" ] && exit; ln -s "$F" "$N (symlink)"' - %f %n
action.description: Softlink between two files or directories

action.name: Check data integrity
action.command:
hashType="$(echo %n | awk -F "." '{print $NF}' | sed s/sum//)" && yad --info --title="$hashType"" sum result" --width=400 --height=200 --center --text="
 $("$hashType"sum -c %f)""
" --button=gtk-close | yad --progress --percentage="50" --auto-kill --auto-close --center --title="Checksum utility" --text=" Checking ""$hashType"" sum of 
"" ""$(echo %n | rev | cut -f2- -d. | rev)"" "

action.name: Install Deb Files
action.command: x-terminal-emulator -e bash -c "sudo apt install %F; echo;read -n 1 -s -r -p 'press any key to close'"
action.description: Install deb packages and dependencies with apt

action.name: Check MIME-type
Проверить MIME-тип
action.description: Check the MIME type of the selected file/files

action.name: Convert to HEVC (Very Low Quality, Faster)
Run with custom locale (LC ALL)
Запустить с иной локализацией (LC ALL)
action.command: terminal -e "env LC_ALL=$(zenity --list ru_RU.UTF\-8 en_US.UTF\-8 ja_JP.UTF\-8 zh_CN.UTF\-8 zh_TW.UTF\-8 С.UTF\-8 --column=locales) wine %f"

action.name: Run with fps limit (DXVK FRAME RATE=???)
Запустить с ограничением FPS (DXVK FRAME RATE=???)
Force AMD (example DXVK FILTER DEVICE NAME)
action.command: terminal -e "env DXVK_FILTER_DEVICE_NAME=\"AMD Radeon Graphics (RADV RENOIR)\" wine %f"
action.description: Additional configuration of this item may be required! This is an example of using DXVK_FILTER_DEVICE_NAME.
